nodes.text: Fel was a male Human Major of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. Part of Eighty-second Armored unit, he was caught by the Sith Empire and impsioned on A-77. He was eventually rescued by Havoc Squad during th A-77 operation.

Major Fel appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Trooper class mission only if the player makes the Light Side choice on A-77. In the Dark Side option player saves Ava Jaxo at the cost of 314 prisoners who all perish, including Fel.
